content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello, Mary Smith. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable during your stay in Munich. Let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I'm looking for a price that reflects the size of the apartment and the location. Would you be able to offer a discount considering the long-term lease?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Certainly, Mary. I'm open to discussing a long-term lease. What term were you considering? The apartment's size and location are quite favorable, and I'm sure we can find a fair price that suits both our needs.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I was thinking of a one-year lease, with the possibility of extending if all goes well. Would a 10% discount off the initial asking price be an acceptable starting point for negotiations?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: A one-year lease with the option to extend is an attractive offer, Mary. A 10% discount off the initial asking price is certainly a good starting point for negotiations. I would be willing to accept that as a sign of goodwill to build a long-term relationship. Would you agree to the price of 1000 Euro per month, with a 10% discount for the first year? This would amount to 900 Euro per month for the duration of the lease.
name: Heinrich Heine
